banDetailedDescription.description: Ban a user from your server so they can no longer join back.

arguments.name: Users
arguments.description: The users to ban. This can be mentions or user IDs. You can also ban up to ten users at a time.

arguments.name: Time
arguments.description: An optional duration to ban the users for. This time can be formatted as `2h` for two hours or `1w` for one week.

arguments.name: Reason
arguments.description: The optional reason for the ban. This will be added to the server's audit logs.

arguments.name: Days
arguments.description: The optional amount of days worth messages to delete. This can be between 1 and 7, such as `--days=1` or `--days=7`.

arguments.name: Refrence
arguments.description: The optional case to refrence in the moderation log. This can be the number of a prior moderation case.

caseDescription: View a prior moderation case from your server.
caseNoExist: {{ERROR}} A moderation case with the id `{{id}}` doesn't exist in this server.
guildBansEmpty: {{ERROR}} This server doesn't have any banned members.
guildBansNotFound: {{ERROR}} That member doesn't seem to be banned in this server.

kickDetailedDescription.description: Kick a member from your server.

arguments.name: Users
arguments.description: The users to kick. This can be mentions or user IDs. You can also kick up to ten users at a time.

arguments.name: Reason
arguments.description: The optional reason for the kick. This will be added to the server's audit logs.

arguments.name: Refrence
arguments.description: The optional case to refrence in the moderation log. This can be the number of a prior moderation case.

muteDetailedDescription.description: Mute a member from your server so that they can no longer talk.

arguments.name: Users
arguments.description: The users to mute. This can be mentions or user IDs. You can also mute up to ten users at a time.

arguments.name: Time
arguments.description: An optional duration to mute the users for. This time can be formatted as `2h` for two hours or `1w` for one week.

arguments.name: Reason
arguments.description: The optional reason for the mute. This will be added to the server's audit logs.

arguments.name: Refrence
arguments.description: The optional case to refrence in the moderation log. This can be the number of a prior moderation case.

reasonDescription: Edit the reason for a moderation case in your server.
restrictEmbedDescription: Restrict embeding for members of your server, preventing them from embeding links such as GIFs.
restrictEmbedSuccess: {{SUCCESS}} Successfully embed restricted {{users, and}}, creating case {{range}}.
restrictEmbedSuccess_other: {{SUCCESS}} Successfully embed restricted {{users, and}}, creating cases {{range}}.
unmuteDescription: Unmute members of your server so they can talk again.
unRestrictEmbedDescription: Remove embed restrictions for members of your server, allowing them to embed links again.
unRestrictEmbedSuccess: {{SUCCESS}} Successfully restored embed permissions for {{users, and}}, creating case {{range}}.
unRestrictEmbedSuccess_other: {{SUCCESS}} Successfully restored embed permissions for {{users, and}}, creating cases {{range}}.
